description: Topher DiMaggio shows off his skills as a personal trainer, coaching Riley Price through a brief workout. Riley moves through sit-ups and pushups with ease, earning him a reward: Topher's big cock. After some mutual cock-sucking Topher tells Riley to bend over and grab the punching bag so he can fuck his ass. The two athletic studs fuck all over the gym until they both shoot their loads.
title: Backroom Exclusives 26, Scene #05
